titleStmt.title: To all the nations under the whole heavens and to all those that have ministred to the letter and yet are ignorant ... from those people who are despitefully called Quakers, who tremble at the word of God in their hearts ... / [by] G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Wilson and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
